summary: 2 families looking for a new home go to an isolated open house, but when they find a girl with no tongue, they soon discover they can't leave.
cast: Marc Singer|Art LaFleur|Hayley DuMond|Janey Gioiosa|Paul McGill|Rebekah Kennedy|Victoria Vance|Jon Cobb|Emma Rayne Lyle|Pat Cassidy|Bridget Garwood|Jen Hines|Kevin O'Donnell|Adrienne Oliver|David Rath|Evan Steinberg|Jack Steinberg|Jennifer Hoyt Tidwell|Joia Wood|Greg Black
title: House Hunting
